com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class AbstractTreeNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.AbstractTreeNode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TreeNode, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DevToolkit.UITreeNode, ObjectGraphNode, TableTreeNode

    public abstract class AbstractTreeNode
extends Object
implements TreeNode, Serializable
    A default implementation of the TreeNode interface. This class is abstract, as it doesn't make sense to instantiate a TreeNode that doesn't contain any data.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getPath

        public TreeNode[] getPath()
        Returns the path from the root, to get to this node. The last element in the path is this node.
        Specified by:
        getPath in interface TreeNode
        Returns:
        an array of DefaultTreeNode objects giving the path, where the first element in the path is the root and the last element is this node.
